title: Polearm Master
content: 3, as is in DnD 5e. For Circle of Spores, the feat does not work together with Shillelagh. Both reactions will not roll their damage on WIS, but rather will do so on DEX/STR stats. Additionally, Symbiotic Entity's bonus necrotic damage do not apply as well. The Bonus Action attack can also scale off of Dexterity if it's higher.
